<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102942</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102942</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">ARS Science and Technology 4 Kids!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der ARS Wissenschaft und Technologie-4 Zicklein!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Gosses de la Science et de la technologie 4 d'ARS 
!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Miúdos da ciência e da tecnologia 4 de ARS!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Capretti di scienza e di tecnologia 4 di ARS!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία 4 ARS κατσίκια!</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Cabritos de la ciencia y de la tecnología 4 de 
ARS!</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">is a series of stories about what scientists do at the Agricultural Research Service. It is geared to kids 8 to 13 years old.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">ist eine Reihe Geschichten über, was Wissenschaftler am 
landwirtschaftlichen Forschung Service tun. Sie wird zu den 
Zicklein 8 bis 13 Jahre alt übersetzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">est une série d'histoires au sujet de ce que les 
scientifiques font au service agricole de recherches. Elle est 
adaptée aux gosses 8 à 13 ans de .</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">é uma série das histórias sobre o que os cientistas 
fazem no serviço agricultural da pesquisa. É engrenada aos 
miúdos 8 a 13 anos velhos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">è una serie di storia circa che cosa gli scienziati fanno
al servizio agricolo di ricerca. È adattata ai capretti vecchio
8 - 13 anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">είναι μια σειρά ιστοριών για αυτά που οι επιστήμονες 
κάνουν στην υπηρεσία γεωργικής έρευνας. Συνδέεται με τα 
κατσίκια 8 έως 13 ετών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">es una serie de historias sobre lo que hacen los 
científicos en el servicio agrícola de la investigación. Se 
engrana a los cabritos 8 a 13 años de viejo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102942</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/ars-science-and-technology-4-kids</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
